BestOfQOS.Letter1: @, ^^The Stardrop Saloon has been chosen to participate in a pilot program by "The Queen of Sauce". This program called "The Best of 'The Queen of Sauce'" allows me to sell recipes from the show!^[days] days after a recipe first airs I can sell it in the saloon, due to licensing fees each will cost [price]g$.^^    -Gus
